document.full_text: one in every 25 teens reported an "irresistible urge" to be on the internet, tension when they weren't online, or said they had tried to quit or cut down on internet time, according to a u.s. study.
document.title: how many teens have "internet addiction?"
lines_and_colors: one in every 25 teens reported an "irresistible urge" to be on the internet, tension when they weren't online, or said they had tried to quit or cut down on internet time, according to a u.s. study.
